overview: Film footage from The Birth of a Nation, Die Abenteuer des Mister West im Lande der Bolschewiki, The Docks of New York, Tabu, Morocco, Citizen Kane, Kiss of Death, Johnny Guitar, Das Rote Frauen-Bataillon, Fireworks, Rabbitt's Moon, Eaux d'Artifice and Invocation of my Demon Brother.
title: Histoire du cinema
